name: Sticky Block: Collect Cubes
description:
Stick and Block!

Sticking Blocks is a block control game. Drag your finger to move your blocks ! Stay focus to sticky for blocks !

When you hit a block, it'll stick to your blocks. Sticking Blocks is the best block control game ! Blocks are very sticky, how far can you go ?


Be careful ! You must not hit black blocks which will destroy your blocks !


Good shape and size of block will be help for winning the level.
Shoot as many balls as possible and let them into the hole.

Enjoy!
